pages.text: The Sneaky setting determines which side of the adjacent inventory the card attempts to operate on.$(br2)For example, a furnace accepts items from the 'Top Side' of the block. If the node is on a side of the furnace, set the sneaky mode of the insert card to 'Up'.
This card will now attempt to insert items into the 'top' side of the furnace.$(br2)Another card can be set to 'Sneaky Down' to insert fuel into the bottom of the furnace.
